page.title: 16Childrens Games 2
page.content: {Woofers} This is a game for 11 year olds. You have a boys side and a girls side. The boys go after the girls. When you are caught you stand by a post or in a box at the corner of the playground. It is up to the other girls to free you by touching you on the hand. If they get caught then they end up in the box as well. When all the girls are caught they have to catch all the boys. It is best if you have the same number of boys as girls. A good number to have on each side is 10. If everyone plays fairly, woofers can be a really good game. Kathryn Thompson and Hayley Dunster.
